# Type alias: CreatePriceLineOptions

> **CreatePriceLineOptions**: `Partial`
> \<[`PriceLineOptions`](../interfaces/PriceLineOptions.html)\> & `Pick`
> \<[`PriceLineOptions`](../interfaces/PriceLineOptions.html),
> `"price"`\>

Price line options for the
[ISeriesApi.createPriceLine](../interfaces/ISeriesApi.html#createpriceline)
method.

`price` is required, while the rest of the options are optional.
